name: Wordle Solver
description:
Solver for Wordle: https://www.powerlanguage.co.uk/wordle/

Use "Next Word" to get a recommended word based on the available clues. Use "<>" to see other word options. If you need to make corrections to clues from earlier words, "c" will recommended a new word based on the corrected clues. Click/tap a letter to change it manually (virtual keyboard doesn't work on mobile). "Reset" will reset the board.
